title: WHO Renames Monkeypox As ‘Mpox’ To Avoid Stigma
description: Experts called for the disease to be renamed in August.
content:
Topline
Monkeypox will now be referred to as “mpox” by the World Health Organization over concerns of racist and stigmatizing language, the agency announced Monday, as new cases in the U.S. continue to plummet.
Monkeypox to be renamed "mpox" by the W... [3150 chars]
source.name: Forbes

title: WHO renames monkeypox as mpox, citing racism concerns
description: The U.N. health agency said in a statement Monday that mpox was its new preferred name for monkeypox, saying that both monkeypox and mpox would be used for the next year while the old name is phased out.
content:
LONDON (AP) — The World Health Organization has renamed monkeypox as mpox, citing concerns the original name of the decades-old animal disease could be construed as discriminatory and racist.
The U.N. health agency said in a statement Monday that mpo... [2382 chars]

title: Monkeypox has been renamed by the WHO. Here's why
description: The old name, while confusing, isn’t the issue so much as the weaponization of it, experts say. The new name is "mpox".

title: Biden administration plans to let mpox emergency declaration end in January
description: The US Department of Health and Human Services said Friday that it does not plan to renew the public health emergency declaration for mpox.
content:
